headline: Honeywell (HON): Assessing Valuation After AI-Powered Refinery Partnership With TotalEnergies
summary: Honeywell International (HON) has kicked off a new partnership with TotalEnergies, launching a pilot of its AI-powered Experion Operations Assistant at the Port Arthur Refinery in Texas. Early outcomes are already pointing to smoother operations and fewer emissions, which is capturing investor interest in Honeywell's industrial automation capabilities. See our latest analysis for Honeywell International. Shares of Honeywell International have seen some renewed momentum following its AI...
